form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 PLA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS HOSP TROV DOC CLIN QUIRURGICO FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) 3 30 1991 CITY Santa Clara VC COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at Cuba NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX I certify that on the above date I examined ETIENNE CILENCIUX LESPERANCE (Mo., Day, Yr.) F M 20 6 1900 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 0060201462 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Granuloma Inguinale Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease Mental Retardation or Disability: Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ Dr. Julian Rodríguez Reyes 12-3-91 DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate treatment under Remarks) Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: AIDS test VDRL DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY Dra. Delina Romero Loynaz 12-3-91 Dra. Delina Romero Loynaz 12-3-91 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. Signature e 30-3-91 Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE Dr. Ricardo García Puentes NSN 7540-00-139-0058 the HOSPITAL CUN PROV. DOCENTE 30-3-91 50457-103 C.
